roleset.name: to record in a chronological order
roleset.note: CHRONICLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chronicle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from chronicle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: It chronicles how , over a period of a dozen years , Southern Methodist University bought its way to football respectability in the Southwest Conference , [*-3] only to find itself trapped and strangled [*]by the athlete-payoff system [0] it created [*T*-1] [*T*-2] .
example.arg: how , over a period of a dozen years , Southern Methodist University bought its way to football respectability in the Southwest Conference , [*-3] only to find itself trapped and strangled [*]by the athlete-payoff system [0] it created [*T*-1] [*T*-2]
